executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Use KMS endpoints defined in TESTSPRITE_PRODUCT_SPEC.md. The system runs two services: KMS-1 on http://127.0.0.1:9010 and KMS-2 on http://127.0.0.1:9020. Execute the happy-path: 1) On KMS-1 call /api/v1/keys/enc_keys (2 keys, size 256) with X-SAE-ID=25840139-0dd4-49ae-ba1e-b86731601803 and X-Slave-SAE-ID=c565d5aa-8670-4446-8471-b0e53e315d2a; 2) Verify KMS-2 /api/v1/kme/verify returns all_verified=true for those key IDs; 3) On KMS-2 call /api/v1/keys/dec_keys for those key IDs with headers swapped; 4) Repeat 10 times sequentially. Timeouts <= 5s. If KMS-2 is not reachable, report clearly.
